name: hreflang x-default Tag for WPML | inventivo
author: Nils Harder

sections.description:
Add the missing hreflang x-default Tag for WPML.

Important: This is a light version of the plugin.
In order to get the Premium Plugin with an advanced fallback method and (NEW! for those who do not use WPML but Weglot) with Weglot Support, please checkout: https://www.inventivo.de/en/the-x-default-tag-in-wpml-is-missing-what-now

Visit our Website in order to find more WordPress plugins.

Small and simple:
– Responsive – fits to all screens
– Lighweight code

Get your hreflang x-default Tag for WPML Plugin now!

How it works:

  1. Upload the Plugin
  2. Activate the Plugin
sections.installation:
Use WordPress’ Add New Plugin feature, searching “Onpage SEO Tweaks | inventivo”, or download the archive and:

  1. Unzip the archive on your computer
  2. Upload inventivo-hreflang-xdefault-tag directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.0.6 Ability to dismiss admin notice persistently.

1.0.5 Added note for Weglot Support in Premium Plugin

1.0.4 Add admin image and notice.

1.0.3 Change class name.

1.0.2 Code cleanup.

1.0.1 Code cleanup.

1.0.0 Modify code for compatibility with newer WPML versions.

0.0.3 Moved project to github.

0.0.2 Added fix for not causing error when WPML is not installed or icl_get_languages function is not defined.
